AI Research Literature
===================

This section covers AI research papers and materials available in the repository.

Available Papers
--------------

1. **Attention is All You Need**
   - Location: ``literature-pdfs/ai-research/Attention is All You Need.pdf``
   - Seminal paper introducing the transformer architecture

2. **VoiceCraft Demo Paper**
   - Location: ``literature-pdfs/ai-research/VoiceCraft-DemoPaper.pdf``
   - Documentation of voice-related AI technology
